tender.title: Construction of road from Chapaguri Amteka Main Road near Bidhan Roys house to Manikpur Bazar Tiniali along with 1 No. RCC Cell Bridge and 3 Nos. Box Culvert under Bhabanipur VCDC (Length-2.9 KM) in Chirang District under CMs Goodwill Project in BTC
